album.title: Rock Band
album.description: Mor ve Ötesi is a Turkish rock band from Istanbul. History Kerem Kabadayi, Harun Tekin, Derin Esmer and Alper Tekin founded in early 1995. First album was in august.

album.title: Rock Band
album.description: Duman is one of Turkey's most successful rock bands. In the early 1990s, Kaan Tangöze (vocals) and Ari Barokas (electric bass) formed the rock band Mad Madame.

album.title: Rock Band
album.description: Born on 09.11.1978, S. Birol Namoglu started amateur music while studying at İSTEK Kemal Atatürk High School as a vocalist in the high school group he founded with E.I. and M.E.

album.title: Rock Band
album.description: Kurban (The Sacrifice) is a Turkish rock band. The band formed in 1995. The members are, Kerem Tüzün, Burak Gürpinar, Deniz Yilmaz and Özgür Kankaynar.
